string.value: You're definitely getting stronger. #b#p1032001##k suggests another training session.
#p1032001# wants you to eliminate #r35 #o0210100#s#k. You feel like you've got this handled. Shouldn't be hard at all. Go and get those #o0210100#s! \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21341##k
You eliminated 35 #o0210100#s. Haha! You're feeling quite proud of yourself.
두번째 수련을 마친지 얼마나 되었더라... 그 동안 자네 실력은 또 한 걸음 앞으로 나아갔군. 그렇게 성실하게 계속 수련을 하다보면, 언젠가는 높은 경지에 오를 수 있을 것이네. ...하지만 아직은 초보 마법사일 뿐이니, 이 하인즈의 도움을 받게나.
이번에 해야 할 일은 슬라임 35마리 퇴치라네. 많다고? 물론 적은 수는 아니지만, 자네가 처치하기 어려운 숫자도 아니지. 강해지고 싶다면 더 참고 인내하는 법을 배워야 한다네. 어서 가서 슬라임을 퇴치하게.
스스로 수련을 할 수 있다면 그보다 좋은 것은 없지.
You finished your second training session! You're improved. If you keep training yourself, you can be the best. Now, you're still a beginner and you'll need #p1032001#'s help.

Your mission is to kill #r35 #o0210100##k. Too many? It's not a small number for sure. But, you can handle it. If you want to be stronger, you must learn to train hard. Go and eliminate #o0210100#. I wish you luck!
It's the best if you can train by yourself.
You killed 35 #o0210100#s! I'm mildly astonished by your skill thus far. See me if you want another traning session!
You shouldn't be satisfied with this. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
You haven't eliminated #r35#o0210100##k. Don't make haste. Take your time but be alert when hunting.
